name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-sp-dev-fx-webparts-react-M365-Planner-Timeline
title: M365 Planner Timeline Web Part
shortDescription: This web part allows you to display a planner task in a vertical timeline.
longDescription: Render a group plan in a web part displaying the tasks in a vertical timeline. You can filters the task for all tasks (include completed tasks) or just active tasks and select the task bucket in for the plan.
You select the plan and bucket of tasks in the property pane of the web part, will set the default render settings.
Each task has an (i), you can click on it to see the details of the task.
The web part uses the Microsoft Graph to interact with the M365 planner tasks.

thumbnails.alt: Web Part to display a planner plan tasks in a vertical timeline.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
